definition: bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
to speak conceited nonsense/to come out with arrogant claptrap
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
to show off one's military strength (idiom); to strut around/to bluff/to bluster
to oppress/to rule as a despot/to tyrannize
